name: backuppc
description: BackupPC is a high-performance network backup system designed for servers and desktops. It features disk-based storage, deduplication, a web interface, and extensive scheduling for hands-off data protection.
features: Network Backup: High-performance backup for servers and desktops. Comprehensive protection.
Deduplication: Save storage space with intelligent deduplication. Efficient storage.
Disk-Based Storage: Fast backup and restore from disk. Quick recovery.
Web Interface: Manage backups through browser. Easy administration.
Automated Scheduling: Set it and forget it backup schedules. Hands-off protection.
Multiple Protocols: Support for SMB, rsync, and more. Flexible connectivity.
Compression: Reduce backup size with compression. Save space.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over backup infrastructure. Data sovereignty.
